translation: Arjuna said, "O Krishna, you praise renunciation of actions and also yoga. Please tell me conclusively which is better of the two."
commentary: 5.1 Sannyasa renunciation? of actions of actions? Krishna O Krishna? Again again? Yoga Yoga? f and? Thou praisest (Thou) praisest? that which? Shreyaá¸¥ better? of these two? One one? That that? Me to me? Tell me tell? certainly conclusively.Commentary Thou teachest renunciation of actions and also their performance. This has me confused. Tell decisively now which is better. It is not possible for a man to resort to both at the same time. Yoga here means Karma Yoga. (Cf.III.2)
